* NEW - Style your text with Underline, Uppercase, Lowercase and Titlecase.
* NEW - Background colors option added
* RESOLVED - UI issue of landscape editor in iPhone XS Max
* Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• New Feature: New Fonts Screen
- We have added a new fonts screen in the app, so you can:
- Download new fonts and apply in the design
- Install your own fonts into app

• New Feature: Image Crop in Shape
- You can crop images in various shapes.

• New Search option: You can now search for Backgrounds and Stickers.

• Performance improved.

New Version Includes:
• Auto Paragraph Text:
- Now you can adjust the text in a paragraph using paragraph handle

• Text Size Input:
- Now you can input the size of the text in number to set the size of the texts as you want

• Color Picker:
- Now you can pick any color from the canvas for the text

Also, Important Bug Fixes!

Just update and use it!

• Changed the logo of the app for better visibility.

New Sticker Features:
• Shadow:
- Now you can apply shadow to the stickers with options like angle, blur, color, and opacity

• Stretch:
- Now you can stretch stickers in any side

• 3D Rotation:
- Now you can apply rotation in three angles to the stickers: Round, Vertical, Horizontal

Just update and use it!

- Make your texts curved by using new Curve option.

- Now you can flip texts horizontally and vertically
